collection.name: MekaVerse
collection.description:
The MekaVerse is a collection of 8,888 generative Mekas inspired by the Japanese Anime universe.

In the distant future, drivers fight in a world divided into 4 Factions. Originals Meka, Mirage, F9, and Gadians are the Titans who rule this planet. Which Faction are you going to join?

Each MekaVerse NFT holder has access to exclusive events on Discord, Twitter, and more. 
The Mekaverse does not stop at one planet, it extends far beyond that!

[MekaBots](https://opensea.io/collection/themekabots)

[MekaVerse Factory](https://opensea.io/collection/mekaverse-factory)
